title: Warning ping short cut (v)
body: Warning ping shortcut v not working since latest patch. Key binding correct in settings but malfunctioning on use.

replies.body: So it isnt just me, ive been having that issue too.

Known bug and we are working on it =) Thanks for the report though. Tilted me hard the first game I played on new patch haha.

http://imgur.com/0NQzZlG.jpg
yeh it ruined me in my game a few times. I wanted to ping run away from drag. team thought i was pinging to keep doing it... rip

Found a band aid solution for now

https://www.facebook.com/Maraudaur/photos/a.547200335437052.1073741828.546307902192962/760786354078448/?type=3&theater

Change your bind from retreat ping to quick retreat to get the careful ping back
Danke. Should get me out of the danger zone tonight. The amount of times my team mates engaged when I wanted them to run last night....FML but kinda comedy too.
